alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Orange; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 5:12PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Fairfield, Hudson, Passaic, Union, Bergen, Essex, Orange, Putnam, Queens, Bronx, Richmond, Kings, Rockland, Westchester and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 615 PM EST... At 509 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ellenville to near Pompton Lakes to near Millington. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Paterson, Elizabeth, Flatbush, New Rochelle, Flushing, Passaic, Bayonne, White Plains, Wayne, Mott Haven and Hoboken. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Orange; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland; Southern Westchester
